questionnaire.title: Product Placement Recontact Questionnaire
questionnaire.introduction: Hello, I am from a national Market Research Company. About 10 days ago we sent you a carton of 2 True cigarettes to try.

questions.question: Which of the two products did you try first?
About how many packs of each product did you yourself smoke?
options: More Than 1 Pack But Less Than 2
More Than 2 Packs But Less Than 3
More Than 3 Packs But Less Than 4
More Than 4 Packs But Less Than 5

instructions: If respondent smoked 'None' of both products: Ask Q.C, record and terminate.
If respondent smoked 'None' of only 1 product: Ask Q.C.
If respondent smoked some of both products: Ask Q.1A.
